member.name: T:SandcastleBuilder.UnsafeNativeMethods
member.summary: This internal class is used for access to some Win32 API functions.
member.remarks: The window placement functions are used so as to support restoring the window on multi-monitor systems.

member.name: F:SandcastleBuilder.UnsafeNativeMethods.SW_SHOWNORMAL
member.summary: Show window in normal position

member.name: F:SandcastleBuilder.UnsafeNativeMethods.SW_SHOWMINIMIZED
member.summary: Show window minimized

member.summary: Get the window's placement information
member.param: The window handle for which to get information
member.returns: True on success, false on failure

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.UnsafeNativeMethods.SetWindowPlacement(System.IntPtr,SandcastleBuilder.WINDOWPLACEMENT@)
member.summary: Set the window's placement information
member.param: The window handle for which to set the information
member.returns: True if successful, false on failure

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.MainForm.btnAddAssembly_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Add one or more documentation assemblies
member.remarks: This will assume that the matching file (assembly or comments file) has the same name as the selected file. If a match is not found, the missing file's name is set to "Unknown" and the Edit option can be used to fix it.
